description: A text input component with validation, templating, and formatting options.

text.info: The text content to process or display.

text_type.info: The type of text content (plain, template, markdown, html, json).

strip_whitespace.info: Whether to remove leading and trailing whitespace from the text.

validate_format.info: Whether to validate the text format based on the selected text type.

template_variables.info: JSON object containing variables to replace in template text. Use {key} or {{key}} in text.

max_length.info: Maximum allowed length of the text (0 for unlimited).

min_length.info: Minimum required length of the text (0 for no minimum).

regex_pattern.info: Regular expression pattern to validate the text format.

case_sensitive.info: Whether regex pattern matching should be case sensitive.

encoding.info: Character encoding to use for text processing.

warnings.invalid_template_variables: Invalid JSON format in template variables: {error}

errors.text_too_short: Text is too short ({length} characters). Minimum required: {min_length}
errors.text_too_long: Text is too long ({length} characters). Maximum allowed: {max_length}
errors.regex_validation_failed: Text does not match the required pattern: {pattern}
errors.format_validation_failed: Text does not match the expected {format} format
